meanings.definition: A person who continues to live after an event in which others have died.
meanings.sent1: The survivors of the shipwreck were rescued by the coast guard.
meanings.sent2: The survivors of the earthquake were grateful for the aid they received.
meanings.sent3: The survivors of the camping trip joked about their adventure.
meanings.sent4: The survivors of the marathon felt like champions crossing the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The survivors of the plane crash shared a bond that would never be broken.

meanings.definition: Those who remain alive after a disaster or tragedy.
meanings.sent1: The survivors of the flood found shelter in a nearby school.
meanings.sent2: The survivors of the fire were thankful for the firefighters' bravery.
meanings.sent3: The survivors of the picnic laughed about their burnt marshmallows.
meanings.sent4: The survivors of the storm emerged stronger than ever before.
meanings.sent5: The survivors of the avalanche clung to hope amidst the snow.
